divs: sighting details i was playing with friends, summer vacation, "g" points and tells me that the white balls of light are back, i say "lets go see what they are", we walked to the end of [name removed\cms\tg] driveway and one of the lights stops in mid air, as if looking at us, that us stop and look at each other puzzled, suddenly the light swoops to the end of the street and stright to [name removed\cms\tg] and i, almost faster then i could see. the ball was right in front of "g", almost chest high, and i was froze in place, i could still see, but in black and white, all sound gone, and i was falling forward, but not falling. the light slowly moved to me but stayed in front of "g" at the same time, it looked like a tube by the time it was in front of me, 1 foot from my face, like a florecent light it glowed blue and looked like tight flames boiling. suddenly i feel i'm being stretched, starting at my head, now i'm coming apart, from left to right, i'm taken apart in the form of digits, black rectangle digits are taking me apart and i'm flying through what looks a wormhole, i'm pulled clockwise forward into the light. suddenly i can see my neighborhood flinging everwhere, so much information at once that i thought i was hallucinating, i was scared at first, but started controling it and found i was going wherever i look, but not with my eyes, looking with my mind. this vehicle flys instantly to the location you've fixed on and instantly back, i felt i was in both places at once. my erratic flying must have startled the real pilot, as he exclamed,"sheesh", or more like "jeese", i lowered my head slightly, and went from seeing outside with my head to seeing with my eyes again. i'm sitting in a big square chair that looks like stone, the whole place looks like stone and should be hard and uncomfortable, but its not. i look right then to the left and behind and see a guy that looks like the grinch that stole christmas, he's standing at a podium looking at what must have been a monitor, he doesn't notice me at first, when he does, he quickly reached to the upper right of his podium and with bear claw finger nail, pushs a button and im back outide and the ball pulls itself back together, and flys back to his friends. i look at "g" and he's looking at me, he yells at the top of his lungs at me,"awwwwwwww", and runs full bore to his house so i went home, too. *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms).
Summary: Outside with friends, ran to see balls of light, pulled inside, flew up to houses and back, heard noise, turned and saw grinch at podium studying monitor.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Eugene
There were no other sightings in Eugene on or around July 30th 1967
